articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, president of the Republic of Uganda and chairman of the Uganda National Resistance Movement, on May 16.
					 The president in the message extended warm greetings to Kim Jong Un and the government of the DPRK, the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people on his own behalf and on behalf of the government of the Republic of Uganda, the Uganda National Resistance Movement and the Ugandan people as regards the successful holding of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the WPK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's election is a clear demonstration of the trust of the Korean people to hold him as the leader in high esteem, the message said.
					
					 It extended greetings to Kim Jong Un and the Korean people on this significant day, an important event in the history of the great country and hoped for close cooperation with him in the future.
					
					 Availing himself of this great and auspicious opportunity to express satisfaction with the harmoniously good relations of cooperation between the two countries and two parties, the president expressed once again his intent to closely work with Kim Jong Un to further strengthen these wonderful relations in the common interests.
					
					 The president wished Kim Jong Un good health in the future, too, as well as the Korean people and the Workers' Party of Korea eternal prosperity.
					
					 He expressed once again the warmest congratulations and noble tribute to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian Party Leader
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a congratulatory message from S. M. Mironov, chairman of "A Just Russia", on May 11.
					 The message said:
					
					 Please accept my congratulations to you on your election as chairman of the WPK on behalf of "A Just Russia" and on my own behalf.
					
					 The Seventh Congress of the WPK closed in Pyongyang on May 9 is of historical significance for the party and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The congress showed that the people are united around the party and the leadership and that the DPRK is ready to hasten denuclearization of the world and achieve peace and security in the region and other parts of the world as a responsible state.
					
					 We two parties have forged the relations of friendship and cooperation.
					
					 We will as ever boost constructive dialogue on all the important issues of mutual concern.
					
					 We wish you good health and big successes in your work.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian Party Leader
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), on May 12 received a congratulatory message from V. V. Zhirinovsky, chairman of the Liberal Democratic Party of Russia.
					 The message extended congratulations to Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the WPK at its Seventh Congress.
					
					 It said that the election proved boundless trust in Kim Jong Un of all the party members and other Korean people.
					
					 It hoped that he will build socialism in Korea and achieve fresh successes in defending the sovereignty of the DPRK in good health.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan Party Leader
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a congratulatory message from Justine Kasule Lumumba, secretary general of the Uganda National Resistance Movement, on May 13.
					 The secretary general in the message extended warm greetings to Kim Jong Un and the WPK Central Committee on his election as chairman of the WPK at its congress and the successful conclusion of the congress on his own behalf and on behalf of the Uganda National Resistance Movement, and congratulations to Kim Jong Un on his own behalf.
					
					 Expressing the will to continue cooperation with the WPK, he hoped that the excellent relations of friendship between the two parties and joint cooperation programs would continue to be pushed forward.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Tanzanian Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Tanzanian Political Party Leader
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a congratulatory message from Jakaya Mrisho Kikwete, chairman of the Revolutionary Party of Tanzania(RPT), on May 12.
					 The chairman in the message extended sincere congratulations to Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the WPK at its 7th Congress held in Pyongyang from May 6 to 9, 2016 on behalf of all members of the RPT and on his own behalf.
					
					 The message said that Kim Jong Un's election to the top post of the WPK is an expression of the unanimous belief and trust of all members of the WPK in him.
					
					 Expressing belief that the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties would grow stronger, the message wished Kim Jong Un good health and steady success in his new job.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Baskets, Congratulatory Letters from Cambodian, Indian Ambassadors
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Floral Baskets, Congratulatory Letters from Cambodian, Indian Ambassadors
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets and congratulatory letters from Cambodian Ambassador to the DPRK Op Sisawada and Indian Ambassador to the DPRK Jasminder Kasturia on the occasion of his election as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They were separately handed over to an official concerned on Wednesday.
					
					 Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from the Guinean People's Assembly on the same day.

articles.title: Successful 7th Congress of WPK Celebrated at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
articles.content:
Successful 7th Congress of WPK Celebrated at DPRK Embassy in Moscow
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Moscow hosted a reception on Monday as regards the successful holding of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there on invitation were Kalashnikov, secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation who doubles as first vice-chairman of the International Affairs Committee of the State Duma of Russia, Umalatova, chairperson of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, Ponomaryov, chairman of the Parliamentary Group for Russia-DPRK Friendship, Ovsyannikov, head of the Orchestra of the 21st Century, Prokhanov, editor-in-chief of the Russian newspaper Zavtra, and other figures of the political parties, parliament, Ministry of Foreign Affairs, friendly associations, organizations for the study of the Juche idea and media.
					
					 Present there were the DPRK charge d' affaires ad interim and members of his embassy.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before an art piece depicting President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They looked round the photos dealing with the exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 A reception was hosted by the DPRK consulate general in Vladivostok on May 13.

articles.title: Mass Rallies Celebrate WPK Seventh Congress
articles.content:
Mass Rallies Celebrate WPK Seventh Congress
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- There took place mass rallies in North Hamgyong Province and Rason City on Wednesday to celebrate the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there were officials, working people, youths and students of the party, power and economic bodies, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms and universities in the province and the city.
					
					 Speakers said that Marshal Kim Jong Un was elected chairman of the WPK at the Party Seventh Congress, reflecting the unanimous intention and desire of the whole party, the entire army and all the people. 
					
					 They went on:
					
					 The Party Seventh Congress was the one of victory and glory which marked a new watershed in the struggle to further strengthen the WPK and accomplish the cause of the Juche revolution.
					
					 At the congress the WPK fully demonstrated the revolutionary character and invincibility as the Juche-oriented party and once again showcased the world the political and ideological might of the revolutionary ranks single-mindedly united around the party and the leader.
					
					 The speakers called on all the officials, party members and working people to turn out in the struggle to implement the decision of the party congress.
					
					 Then followed mass demonstrations.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Centenarian
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to Ri Ok Suk, women centenarian residing in Neighborhood Unit No. 30 of Somun-dong in Central District, Pyongyang.
					 She was born into a poor peasant family in South Chungchong Province on May 17, Juche 5 (1916). She actively aided her husband who upheld the line for national reunification set forth by President Kim Il Sung after the liberation of the country and waged actions against the moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces to make Korea's division permanent.
					
					 During the Fatherland Liberation War, too, President Kim Il Sung was deeply concerned about the medical treatment of her, the widow of Kim Sam Ryong, a patriotic martyr who sacrificed himself for the independent reunification of the country, and the life of her family members, and showed them benevolent care to be handed down through generations.
					
					 She displayed patriotism for the prosperity of the country in the postwar rehabilitation and construction and socialist construction out of her loyalty to repay the love and trust of the party.
					
					 She was awarded a watch bearing the august name of the President and high-level state commendation, took part in various conferences such as the National Conference of Families of Martyrs and was honored to have a photo taken with the President and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Financial Trade Union Vows to Launch Actions against Unpopular Economic Policy
articles.content:
Financial Trade Union Vows to Launch Actions against Unpopular Economic Policy
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The financial trade union of south Korea on May 14 declared to launch actions against the authorities' unpopular economic policy, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 It said that the present chief executive forced public organs to introduce wage system based on piece rate by the end of May and the heads of public organs are pushing it forward.
					
					It decided to hold a rally with the attendance of 50,000 financial workers in June and go into a general strike in September.

articles.title: Baby Homes and Orphanages Completed in Hamhung, Hyesan
articles.content:
Baby Homes and Orphanages Completed in Hamhung, Hyesan
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Hamhung and Hyesan Baby Homes and Orphanages were successfully built and inaugurated with due ceremonies on Wednesday thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un's love for the younger generations and future.
					 The baby homes and orphanages were built in an elegant and peculiar style in good locations. They are fully equipped with all amenities and conditions necessary for nursing and educating children including nursing and education rooms, intelligence toys rooms, dancing rooms, combined amusement rooms, indoor wading pools, combined physical exercise rooms and medical treatment rooms.
					
					 Officials of South Hamgyong and Ryanggang provinces, children of the baby homes and orphanages and their employees, builders and working people attended the ceremonies.
					
					 Inaugural speeches were made.
					
					 Then, the children of the baby homes and orphanages entered the cradles of love.
					
					 The participants wished them bright future.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place on Wednesday to mark the 30th anniversary of the publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Popularizing Physical Training and Sport and Developing Sporting Skills Rapidly".
					 The work, published on May 19, Juche 75 (1986), clarifies the tasks and methods to develop sports of the country including the issues arising in implementing the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea on popularizing sports and making them an inseparable part of the daily life.
					
					 Ri Jong Mu, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, in a report said that the work is an important document which comprehensively formulated the essence and mission, position and role of sports and issues arising in developing sports.
					
					 A firm foundation has been laid to step up the building of the Juche-oriented sporting power house for the past 30 years since the work was published, he noted, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il conducted energetic activities to ensure that the revolutionary changes were brought about in all parts of physical culture and sports such as popular sports, development of sporting skills and building of sports facilities in the historic drive for accomplishing the cause of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism, and ushered in a new heyday of developing sports.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un set forth the idea of putting the sporting power house status at an earlier date, clearly indicated the orientation and ways for carrying out it and, as a result, huge successes have been achieved in the physical culture and sports.
					
					 The reporter stressed the need to wage a dynamic struggle to develop the Juche-based sports and build a highly civilized socialist nation.
					
					 The meeting was attended by officials, teachers and researchers in the sports field.

articles.title: International Day of Biological Diversity Marked
articles.content:
International Day of Biological Diversity Marked
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- There took place a national workshop on the International Day of Biological Diversity at the People's Palace of Culture Wednesday. 
					 Speakers scientifically explained the theoretical and practical matters necessary for activating the work to protect and increase biological diversity that have something to do with the existence of mankind.
					
					 The participants exchanged successes and experience gained in the work for protecting ecological environment and biological diversity including situation of biological diversity worldwide and importance of swamp.
					
					Present there were officials and experts in environment protection of ministries and national institutions including the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection and the Central Committee of the Nature Conservation Union of Korea, scientific and research institutes and relevant fields, members of the International Union for Conservation of Nature, the Hanns Seidel Foundation of Germany, the UNDP mission here, the Syrian ambassador to the DPRK and a staff member of the German embassy here.
					
					 The participants saw round pictures introducing function of swamp and its use, before enjoying a video on biological diversity.

articles.title: DPRK Agricultural Workers Determined to Implement WPK Congress Decision
articles.content:
DPRK Agricultural Workers Determined to Implement WPK Congress Decision
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Upon hearing the news that Marshal Kim Jong Un was elected as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the agricultural officials and workers in the DPRK are turning out in the drive to implement the decision of the 7th WPK Congress to the letter.
					 Ri Yong Gu, department director of the Ministry of Agriculture, told KCNA:
					
					 Responsible for the country's granary, we will devote all our wisdom and energies to solving the food problem under the guidance of the WPK.
					
					 We, officials, will always stand in the van of the drive for increased grain production, mindful that the people's wellbeing depends on our efforts and their happy life will give pleasure to the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Yong Sik, chief engineer of the Chongsan Co-op Farm in Kangso District, Nampho City, said:
					
					 All the peasants of the farm have a strong will to thoroughly implement the Socialist Rural Theses and the WPK's policy on agricultural revolution, the key to solving the food and agricultural problems, as instructed by the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We will finish the rice transplantation and maize planting in the right time as required by the Juche method of farming and attain the goals of grain and vegetable production for this year under any circumstances.
					
					 Ri Pok Myong, head of a workteam of the Jangchon Vegetable Co-op Farm in Sadong District, Pyongyang, said:
					
					 Under the loving care of the Party, our farm turned into a model unit of socialist rural culture.
					
					 To repay it with increased agricultural production, we will bring about a radical turn in scientific farming.

articles.title: DPRK Educational Workers to Contribute to Building Highly Civilized Socialist Nation
articles.content:
DPRK Educational Workers to Contribute to Building Highly Civilized Socialist Nation
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Educational workers in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are hardening their will to implement the tasks set forth at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The historic report made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the congress serves as a great programme for building a highly civilized socialist nation, a guideline that all the educational workers should always hold fast to, Ri Kwan Ho, a leading official of the Education Commission, told KCNA.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un in the report advanced the tasks and ways for turning our country into a power of talents through further development of education.
					
					 We will strive to preserve the true nature of socialist education and perfect the country's advantageous educational system in keeping with the requirements of the times and the revolution and the global trend of educational development.
					
					 Ju Hyon Il, department director of the Ministry of Higher Education, said:
					
					 We will develop major universities of the country into an educational science research center, a center for international academic exchanges, and decisively raise the level of education and sci-tech research and development at them to the world standard.
					
					 Our efforts will be concentrated on the work to put the educational contents on a practical, comprehensive and modern basis, introduce the profitable and superior teaching methods and radically improve the quality of teachers.
					
					 Kim Song Il, department director of the Ministry of General Education, said:
					
					 We, officials in the field of general education, are ready to train rising generations for all-round talents.
					
					 We will work hard to improve the contents and methods of general secondary schooling and apply various forms of education suited to the regional economic and geographical features.
					
					 Our efforts will be also made to renovate the educational conditions and environment so as to put the material and technological foundations for education on a higher level.

articles.title: DPRK Pays Efforts to Protection of Migratory Birds
articles.content:
DPRK Pays Efforts to Protection of Migratory Birds
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government has given importance to the protection of migratory birds.
					 With the 2016 World Migratory Birds Day as an occasion, an information campaign was launched in the country to raise awareness of the protection of migratory birds among the local people.
					
					 The theme for the day is "…and when the skies fall silent? Stop the illegal killing, taking and trade!"
					
					 Kim Song Ho, section chief of the Biodiversity Institute under the State Academy of Sciences, told KCNA:
					
					 The DPRK government has long taken steps to protect migratory birds in tidelands, seashores and islets of the country.
					
					 In recent months, experts were dispatched to Rason, Ongjin, Sin Islet and other areas, home to migratory birds, to make on-site survey and then take necessary measures.
					
					 Big efforts have gone to preserving diverse ecologies in more than 30 migratory bird reserves in Rason, Kumya, Sin Islet and other areas.
					
					 The Rason migratory bird reserve was listed as a sanctuary of the IUCN.
					
					 The Mundok migratory bird reserve in the west coastal area serves as one of stopovers for migratory birds. Inhabiting this reserve are such rare birds as cranes and snipes.

articles.title: Ancient Metal Types Found in DPRK
articles.content:
Ancient Metal Types Found in DPRK
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Archaeologists of the Korean Central History Museum in the DPRK have recently unearthed four metal types dating back to Koryo Kingdom (918-1392).
					 The discovery was made around Manwoltae in Kaesong, a site of royal palace of Koryo.
					
					 Three of the metal types are of cuboid shape, 12-13mm wide, 10-11mm long and 6-7mm high. Each has an embossed letter on one side and a bead- or dome-shaped groove on the other.
					
					 The last type is 7mm wide and 6 mm long.
					
					 The metal types were made of bronze.
					
					 After all, a total of seven metal types dating back to Koryo Kingdom have been discovered up to now in the country.
					
					 The first was said to be found on a Koryo royal tomb in Kaesong before the liberation of Korea from Japan's colonial rule.
					
					 The second was unearthed in a site 300 meters west of Hoegyong Pavilion in Manwoltae in Juche 45 (1956). It is now preserved at the Korean Central History Museum.
					
					 The third was discovered in southern part of the western architectural group in Manwoltae in November last year.
					
					 The recently-discovered four metal types are similar to the previously- found ones in shape, size and quality.
					
					 It was ascertained at a joint symposium of historians, archaeologists and national classicists of the DPRK on April 20 that the newly found metal types date back to the 12th to 13th centuries.
					
					 This fact goes to clearly prove that Koryo Kingdom was the first in the world to invent metal types.
					
					 Ro Chol Su, vice-director of the National Authority for the Protection of Cultural Heritage, said that more historical relics have been unearthed in the Manwoltae area to enrich the Korea nation's house of heritages.

articles.title: Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Tours Pyongyang
articles.content:
Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Tours Pyongyang
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Pu Yong Uk, chairman of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, visited the National Gifts Exhibition House. 
					 The members of the group paid tribute to the statues of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the general review room.
					
					 They saw round gifts associated with the sincerity of all fellow countrymen ardently revering the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 They also visited the Pyongyang Catfish Farm.
					
					 They went round various places of the farm which has been put on a scientific, intensive and industrial basis.
					
					 They also toured the historical site associated with the Fatherland Liberation War, Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory, etc.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Policy for National Reunification Supported by Chongryon Officials
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Policy for National Reunification Supported by Chongryon Officials
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Leading officials of the organizations under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued statements on Tuesday in support of the policy for national reunification set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un at the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, said that the proposal for national reunification set forth by Kim Jong Un is the most fair, great programme for reunification acceptable by all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad who have blood vessel of the Korean nation as it comprehensively indicates the tasks and ways for paving a wide avenue to independent reunification according to the Juche-oriented line of reunification which dealt with the will and demand of all compatriots in an all-round way and whose vitality was proved in practice.
					
					 Ri Jong Man, managing director of the Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, said that the council would fulfill its honorable duty in the sacred struggle for paving a wide avenue to independent reunification, long-cherished desire of the nation, under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Yong Ju, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, expressed the determination to devote passion of the youth to smashing the moves of the anti-reunification forces and bringing earlier the independent reunification by boosting the solidarity and alliance with the youth and students in the north, the south and abroad true to the policy of national reunification advanced by Kim Jong Un, the lodestar of national reunification.
					
					 Jo Han Ju, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Teachers in Japan, said that the policy of national reunification clarified by Kim Jong Un is the great programme for paving a wide avenue to national reunification by carrying out the lifetime intention and behests of the great leaders and is a reflection of the firm will of the peerlessly great man to realize the desire of all compatriots for reunification and of his warm love for the nation.

articles.title: Chongryon Vice-Chairwoman Supports Policy of National Reunification Set Forth by Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Chongryon Vice-Chairwoman Supports Policy of National Reunification Set Forth by Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- Kang Chu Ryon, vice-chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, made public a statement on May 17 in support of the policy of national reunification set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 Kim Jong Un in his report on the review of the work of the Party Central Committee advanced a strategic task and ways and clarified the policy of the struggle to accomplish the historic cause of national reunification, the statement noted, adding:
					
					 The policy of national reunification advanced by Kim Jong Un is a fair proposal that can be accepted by anyone who has the blood vessel of the Korean nation, be they in the north, the south or abroad.
					
					 If the proposal is put into practice, Korea will demonstrate its dignity and might to the world as a thriving nation with tremendous national power, a country which outpaces the world with the spirit and wisdom peculiar to the nation and a powerful nation of justice that would spearhead peace in Northeast and the world. 
					
					 All the officials of the women's union and other Korean women in Japan warmly support and welcome the policy of national reunification which reflects the efforts of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un's love for the country, the people and the rising generation.
					
					 We will carry out our patriotic duty in the struggle to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification, full of the conviction and optimism that the Korea is sure to be reunified under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, leader of the Juche cause, and that only this will guarantee the happy future of all Korean women in the north and the south and abroad and their beloved children.

articles.title: National Independence Is Lifeline in National Reunification Movement: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
National Independence Is Lifeline in National Reunification Movement: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- National independence is a key to settling the national issues and serves as the lifeline in the movement for national reunification, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 National reunification is the cause to connect the severed blood vessel of the nation and achieve its sovereignty in a nationwide scale.
					
					 It is foolish to think about settling the issue of national reunification in reliance on outside forces, as it is a matter of regaining national sovereignty usurped by outsiders.
					
					 Outside forces do not want to see a reunified powerful country on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 They separated the Korean nation on purpose and have persistently stoked confrontation between the north and the south and chilled the atmosphere whenever there created a phase for defused tension, peace and better north-south relations on the Korean peninsula. It was all aimed to meet their strategic interests, even by infringing upon the interests of the Korean nation.
					
					 National reunification can never be achieved by relying on outside forces, an arch criminal of separation of Korea and disturber of national reunification.
					
					 Now outside forces have got ever more frantic in the moves to interfere in and obstruct national reunification.
					
					 Prompted by their interests for aggression, they intend to render the situation constantly tense, being displeased with de-escalation of tension on the Korean peninsula and improvement of inter-Korean relations.
					
					 It is necessary to preserve the principle of independence for settling the national issue, the reunification issue of the country as the situation around the Korean peninsula gets more complicated and acute.
					
					 All Koreans in the north and the south and abroad should wage a dynamic struggle to independently achieve national reunification under the unfurled banner of national independence whose validity and vitality were fully proven through history and reality.
					
					 Sure is the victory of the cause of national reunification when all Koreans hold fast to national independence as the lifeline in the movement for national reunification and thoroughly implement it.

articles.title: S. Korean Newspaper Blames Chief Executive for Patronizing Her Confidants
articles.content:
S. Korean Newspaper Blames Chief Executive for Patronizing Her Confidants
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore in an article on May 10 blamed the chief executive for arbitrarily installing her confidants at important posts.
					 The chief executive made its confidants take up important posts of major public businesses like director and standing auditor, the article charged, adding:
					
					 For example, the former chief of air force staff was appointed as director of airlines and the man who had worked as vice-chairman of the commitment commission of the Seoul City election measure committee during the last "presidential" election was appointed as standing auditor of the administrative body of the "National Park".
					
					 Noting financial bodies are suffering big losses due to the appointments of those lacking professional qualities, it blamed the chief executive for installing them at important posts despite mounting public criticism.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Denounces Chief Executive over Appointment of Presidential Chief of Staff
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Denounces Chief Executive over Appointment of Presidential Chief of Staff
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People on May 16 carried an editorial titled "Chongwadae personnel affairs this time is a challenge to people's mindset" in denunciation of the chief executive's arbitrary practices.
					 The editorial referred to the fact that the chief executive on May 15 appointed Ri Won Jong, former chairman of the Committee for Regional Development, as the presidential chief of staff.
					
					 Through the appointment of Ri Won Jong, the chief executive revealed her intention to use persons loved by Park Chung-Hee, the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 By appointing Kang Sok Hun, lawmaker from the "Saenuri Party", as senior secretary for economic affairs, the chief executive showed the will to use pro-Park personages in administering the state affairs in the latter half period of her rule.
					
					 A month ago, the angry people punished the ruling party in the general election. Nevertheless, the chief executive is denying the change.
					
					 The editorial warned that if the chief executive persists in her stubbornness, she would face punishment bitterer than that at the time of the general election by the people.

articles.title: Pusan Civic Body Denounces U.S. Preparation for Biochemical War
articles.content:
Pusan Civic Body Denounces U.S. Preparation for Biochemical War
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The Pusan People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea on Tuesday strongly protested against the U.S. preparation for a biochemical war threatening people's lives.
					 The command of the U.S. forces in south Korea set the U.S. facilities at the Dock 8 of Pusan Port under the control of the U.S. imperialist aggressors as the place to which the Jupiter Plan is to be introduced, the plan for the biochemical war, and officially made it known.
					
					 The above-said body disclosed that the introduction of the Jupiter Plan directly and fatally threatens the security of citizens.
					
					 Noting that the plan of "defensive nature" touted by the U.S. forces is quite unreasonable, the body expressed the will to strongly stand against it.

articles.title: Italian Body and Personage Congratulate Kim Jong Un on His Election as WPK Chairman
articles.content:
Italian Body and Personage Congratulate Kim Jong Un on His Election as WPK Chairman
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The Italy-DPRK Cultural Association made public a statement on May 12.
					 Sincerely congratulating supreme leader Kim Jong Un on his election to the top post of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the statement said:
					
					 His election as chairman of the WPK is an expression of the unanimous will, desire and trust of all Korean people in him who pursues the policy for their happiness.
					
					 We whole-heartedly hope that the DPRK led by him would prosper for all ages as a powerful nation.
					
					 Mauro Cazadio, coordinator of the Organization of Communists of Italy issued a statement on the same day in which he manifested his joy over Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the WPK, reiterating his active support for the socialist cause of the WPK and the Korean people.

articles.title: Appeal of Seventh Congress of WPK Supported by British Bodies
articles.content:
Appeal of Seventh Congress of WPK Supported by British Bodies
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, Korean Friendship Association UK and the British preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu released a joint statement on May 10 supporting the appeal made at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The statement fully supported the ardent appeal made at the Seventh Congress of the WPK to all service personnel, youths and people to launch a campaign of creating the Mallima speed for great innovations and leaping progress to implement the decision of the congress.
					
					 The appeal called for never tolerating but mercilessly squashing any element contrary to the idea and intention of the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un and any slightest act of breaking the single-minded unity and backbiting the Party's policies, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 Upon receiving the appeal with great emotion, the followers of the Juche idea and the Songun idea in Britain became convinced that the day when the Korean people would achieve the final victory in socialist construction under the leadership of Chairman of the WPK Kim Jong Un and the WPK is not far-off.

articles.title: Indian Newspaper Praises Invincibility of WPK
articles.content:
Indian Newspaper Praises Invincibility of WPK
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The Indian newspaper Rising Europe on May 12 carried an article titled "DPRK successfully settles the issue of succession to the leadership" illustrated with a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un acknowledging the enthusiastically cheering masses.
					 Electing Kim Jong Un as chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) at its Seventh Congress is an expression of the unshakable faith and will of the party members, servicepersons and other people of the DPRK to accomplish the cause of the Juche revolution through generations, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The WPK set a fine example for carrying forward the idea and cause of the leader by successfully solving the issue of succession to the cause of the Juche revolution.
					
					 The WPK is able to carry on the Juche revolution and the cause of building a party of the leader by upholding Kim Jong Un at the leadership post of the WPK.
					
					 The WPK formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and declared the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as its supreme programme.
					
					 The dignified and glorious WPK, which is blessed with illustrious leaders and is successfully carrying forward the idea and guidance of the leader, will remain invincible.

articles.title: Successful Seventh Congress of WPK Celebrated by Koreans in Germany
articles.content:
Successful Seventh Congress of WPK Celebrated by Koreans in Germany
Pyongyang, May 18 (KCNA) -- The Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany released a statement on May 13 in celebration of the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Noting the society warmly welcomes and congratulates the WPK on its successful 7th congress which opened up the rosy future of a reunified powerful nation for all Koreans and clarified at home and abroad the principled issues arising in dynamically stepping up the cause of global independence, the statement said:
					
					 A proposal to pave the path for reunification by steadily preserving the three charters for national reunification was advanced at the congress.
					
					 The great programme for reunification, which calls for founding a federal state on the basis of recognizing the differing ideas and social systems in the north and the south, as desired and demanded by the entire nation, and carrying out the June 15 joint declaration and the programme for implementing it the October 4 declaration, is the most fair proposal that can be accepted by everyone.
					
					 The congress which proudly declared before all Koreans and the world the resolution to build a reunified powerful country by winning a great victory of the Songun politics is an epochal event that put an end to the foolish dream of the U.S.
					
					 We enthusiastically support the appeal made at the congress which called for implementing all decisions made at the congress and declaring with pride before the whole world the complete victory of socialism in the DPRK.

articles.title: Mitines multitudinarios de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte y la ciudad de Rason
articles.content:
Mitines multitudinarios de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte y la ciudad de Rason
Pyongyang, 18 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 18 los mitines multitudinarios de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte y la ciudad de Rason, respectivamente, para felicitar la terminacion exitosa del VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					Participaron alli los funcionarios, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes de los organismos locales del partido y el Poder, organos economicos, entidades de masas, fabricas, empresas, granjas, universidades, etc. 
					
					Los oradores senalaron que en el VII Congreso del PTC, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un fue electo como Presidente del PTC en reflejo de la unanime voluntad y deseo de todo el partido, el ejercito y el pueblo. 
					
					Enfatizaron que el VII Congreso del PTC fue el conclave de victoria y gloria que marca un nuevo punto de viraje en fortalecer el PTC y llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche mediante la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo. 
					
					Mencionaron que a traves del presente Congreso, se ha manifestado de nuevo a todo el mundo el caracter revolucionario y la invencibilidad del PTC como partido de tipo jucheano y el poderio ideo-politico de las filas revolucionarias unidas monoliticamente en torno al partido y el lider. 
					
					Llamaron a todos los funcionarios, militantes del partido y los trabajadores a levantarse en la materializacion de la resolucion del Congreso del Partido. 
					
					Acto seguido, se desarrollaron las manifestaciones multitudinarias.

articles.title: Inaugurados hospicios y orfanatos de Hamhung y Hyesan
articles.content:
Inaugurados hospicios y orfanatos de Hamhung y Hyesan
Pyongyang, 18 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 18 las ceremonias de inauguracion de los hospicios y orfanatos de Hamhung y Hyesan, respectivamente, construidos magnificamente gracias al amor del Mariscal Kim Jong Un a las generaciones venideras. 
					Los edificios agradables y peculiares levantados en los sitios apropiados disponen en el maximo nivel de todas las condiciones y ambiente necesarios a la crianza y la educacion de los huerfanos tales como las salas de crianza, educacion, juegos intelectuales, danzas, recreos, educacion fisica y asistencia medica y las piscinas bajo techo.
					
					En las ceremonias de inauguracion participaron los funcionarios de las provincias de Hamgyong del Sur y de Ryanggang, los huerfanos y empleados de hospicios y orfanatos, constructores y trabajadores. 
					
					En los actos hubo discursos de inauguracion.
					
					Terminadas las ceremonias, los huerfanos entraron en sus nidos de felicidad.
					
					Los participantes bendijeron el futuro radiante de ellos.

articles.title: Independencia nacional es linea de vida de movimiento por reunificacion, afirma Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Independencia nacional es linea de vida de movimiento por reunificacion, afirma Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 18 de mayo (ACNC) -- En un articulo individual publicado este miercoles, el diario Rodong Sinmun destaca que la independencia nacional es el nucleo para la solucion del problema nacional y la linea de vida del movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria, y continua:
					La reunificacion de la patria es una empresa para reanudar el linaje de la nacion coreana dividida en dos partes por las fuerzas extranjeras y lograr la independencia de la nacion en ambito nacional. 
					
					Resulta muy absurdo el intento de resolver con la ayuda de las fuerzas extranjeras este problema por rescatar la independencia nacional arrebatada por aquellas.
					
					Las fuerzas extranjeras no desean que se levante una potencia reunificada en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					A fin de satisfacer sus intereses estrategicas dividieron artificialmente a la nacion coreana y persiguen la confrontacion entre ambas partes coreanas en cada oportunidad en que se creaba una coyuntura favorable al alivio de la tension, la paz y la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Con la dependencia de las fuerzas extranjeras, que causaron la division nacional y estorban la reunificacion de Corea, no pueden solucionar nunca el problema de reintegracion territorial de la patria.
					
					En particular, se tornan cada dia mas siniestras la intervencion y la obstaculizacion de las fuerzas extranjeras en el problema de reunificacion de Corea. 
					
					A partir de sus intereses agresivos las fuerzas extranjeras no quieren el alivio de la tension en la Peninsula Coreana ni la mejora de las relaciones de ambas partes de Corea, sino tratan de mantener la tension. 
					
					A medida que se complica la situacion en torno a la Peninsula Coreana,  hay que mantener con mas firmeza el principio de la independencia en la solucion del problema nacional y el de reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben luchar con dinamismo por lograr la reunificacion independiente de la patria sosteniendo en alto la bandera de la independencia nacional cuya justeza y vitalidad fueron manifestadas plenamente en la historia y la realidad. 
					
					Es definitiva la victoria de la causa de reunificacion de la patria solo cuando toda la nacion mantenga la independencia nacional como linea de vida del movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria y lo materialice cabalmente.
